document_data.name: Lalambril
document_data.georefs: {{cite web/Candlekeep Forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2015)/01-08 - Lalambril and Barrowhill}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Lalambril''' was a short-lived fiefdom in the [[Border Kingdoms]].
document_data.Geography: The place was in the eastern end of the Border Kingdoms, on the coast of the [[Lake of Steam]]. It was small.
document_data.Government: In the {{yearlinkName|1400}}, Lalambril had a "Lord Bard".
document_data.History: Lalambril had been short-lived, but had existed through the year 1400 DR.
